data.message: Awesome, I hope to win the Stan letter response but I am happy just to donate to help disadvantaged youth :) That's cool too!

replies.message: what typical American can afford a boxing membership and is it a need? I never had any of that crap! Everybody remembers me (middle school courtyard) - me..not Eminem...the one who submitted to the bully.. and I didn't need boxing! I had a man coming to attack...I took him down with one strike. They are totally blowing this up, and you have to be very ignorant to be buying into this.
But.. There was a punching bag that was in my garage and a few sets of punching gloves. Way more intelligent - in respects to being frugal :-)
